Uses of Class
com.pcmiler.routing.RoutingException

Uses of RoutingException in com.pcmiler.routing
 

Subclasses of RoutingException in com.pcmiler.routing
 class GeocodingException
          This exception indicated that there was an exception while handling a command in the data and/or routing servers.
 class StopNotFoundException
          This exception indicated that there was an exception while handling a command in the data and/or routing servers.

LocalTrip()
          Creates a new trip on the local machine in the default region
LocalTrip(java.lang.String region)
          Creates a new trip on the local machine in the region specified by a parameter: Africa, Asia, Europe, NA, Oceania, SA
